EmailTemplate.description: This email template will be sent to the op if they have missed their interview with Paige
EmailTemplate.name: Engineer Application Missed Interview Dry
EmailTemplate.subject: Aspect - Interview reschedule
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please reschedule your interview
Dear {!Engineer_Application__c.First_Name__c},
We had an interview scheduled in, but it looks like you didn’t make it. I hope everything is well.
To book the availability for your interview, please follow this link: https://calendly.com/rose-slack-aspect/wet-trade-interview
Looking forward to hearing from you. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
Kind Regards,
Resources Team
BOOK YOUR INTERVIEW
Help made easy.
www.aspect.co.uk
Aspect Maintenance Services Limited, E7 Barwell Business Park, Leatherhead Road, Chessington, London, KT9 2NY
© 2022 Aspect
